title: PostgreSQL current user
body:
Fixes #3990.

PostgreSQLParser doesn't support `SELECT CURRENT_USER`, because `simpleExpr` of select statment lack of `CURRENT_USER` keyword.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- add `CURRENT_USER` to `simpleExpr`, not `functionCall`.

title: Oracle insert statement bugfix
body:
Fixes #3962.

`InsertValuesExtractor` could extract column segements by `InsertValuesClause` rule, but oracle insert statement `insertValuesClause` lack of `columnNames` , which cause encrypt problem for extracting column segements.

Changes proposed in this pull request:

- Put columnNames into insertValuesClause.

title: QueryHeader load logic table metadata
body:
Fixes #3905.

`QueryHeader` constructor gets column by index based on actual table metadata, not logic table. This would cause that after altering table with operation that add column, execute select operation could get null column which occurs NullPointerException.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- `QueryHeader` constructor gets column by index based on logic table metadata.

title: Insert clause sharding column null text judgement
body:
Fixes #3884.

Method `createShardingCondition` of `InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine` couldn't handle the situation that `ExpressionSegment` of null value in literal insert SQL is `CommonExpressionSegment`, and text of `CommonExpressionSegment` is "null".

Changes proposed in this pull request:

- Method `createShardingCondition` of InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine modify null expression judgement with "null" text.

title: Insert clause sharding column null exception
body:
Fixes #3884. 

Method `createShardingCondition` of `InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine ` couldn't handle the situation that `ExpressionSegment` of null value in literal insert SQL is `CommonExpressionSegment`. Therefore, null value doesn't add to shardingValues and also not throw exception.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Method `createShardingCondition` of `InsertClauseShardingConditionEngine ` adds null expression judgement and throws exception.

title: Support MySQL spatial function
body:
Fixes #3847.

`MySQLParser` doesn't support MySQL spatial function like 'ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE' etc. Therefore, it's necessary to support MySQL spatial function.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
-  MySQL `BaseRule.g4` `functionCall` add all MySQL spatial functions.

title: Support upper case logic table name of sharding configuration
body:
Fixes #3635 

Convert the field logicTable of class TableRuleConfiguration to lower case to support upper case logic table name, which is generated by the method org.apache.shardingsphere.core.yaml.swapper.impl.ShardingRuleConfigurationYamlSwapper#swap(org.apache.shardingsphere.core.yaml.config.sharding.YamlShardingRuleConfiguration)

title: SOURCE unreserved keyword
body:
Fixes #3822.

`SOURCE` is regarded as unreserved keyword in [MySQL reserved keyword](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/keywords.html#keywords-8-0-detailed-S).

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Add `SOURCE` keyword to `unreservedWord_`.
